name: AzureDevTestLabsPopulateEnvironment
description: Deploy an Azure ARM template to an existing DevTest Lab environment.
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure RM Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure Resource Manager subscription to configure before running.

inputs.name: LabId
inputs.label: Lab Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of an existing lab in which the lab VM will be created. This is a pick list generated as a result of selecting an **Azure RM Subscription**.

inputs.name: EnvironmentId
inputs.label: Environment Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of an existing environment that will be deleted. This is a pick list generated as a result of selecting an lab.

inputs.name: SourceTemplate
inputs.label: Source ARM Template
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to an ARM template to add to the environment.

inputs.name: SourceTemplateParameterFile
inputs.label: Source ARM Parameter File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to a ARM template parameters file that provides parameter values for the template.

inputs.name: SourceTemplateParameterOverrides
inputs.label: Source ARM Template Parameters
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set parameter values needed by the template. This will not override the parameter file.

inputs.name: SourceTemplateOutputVariables
inputs.label: Create output variables based on the Source ARM Template output?
inputs.helpMarkDown: Capture source template output as build/release variables.

instanceNameFormat: Deploy ARM template to existing Azure DevTest Labs Environment
